alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sharkey (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 2:02PM CDT until May 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL YAZOO...SOUTHWESTERN HUMPHREYS...NORTHEASTERN SHARKEY AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 202 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Murphy to Myrleville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yazoo City, Benton, Louise, Panther Burn, Delta City, Nitta Yuma, Myrleville, Tinsley, Midnight, Way and Little Yazoo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
